column4: anyone had problems with flash on /some/ sites (myspace music, fb games but not youtube etc) for firefox? have tried many things and all works fine under chrome!!
Yup yup, exactly. For instance vimeo is BLEH, does hardly run at all, while youtube is perfect.
you managed to get it working or? have had to resort to chrome for the time being for some sites but would prefer it all to be on firefox!
Meh, didn't really bother since I rarely use flash
